title: Associate Professor of Mathematics/Computer Science
description: Teach all levels of mathematics classes including: Developmental, College Algebra, Linear Algebra, and Probability and Statistics.    Teach introductory CS courses to CS majors.  Also specialize in courses related to hardware, such as: Embedded System, Computer Architecture, and Networking.

title: Assistant Professor of Mathematics/Computer Science
description: Teach a wide variety of mathematics courses that would be typical for a liberal arts mathematics curriculum

title: Instructor of Mathematics
description: Teach a wide variety of mathematics and computer science courses that would be typical for a liberal arts mathematics curriculum.

title: Mathematics Teacher
description: Public high school teacher teaching primarily freshman level courses.

title: Mathematics Teacher - Long Term Substitute
description: Public high school teacher teaching primarily a one year Algebra sequence.

title: Mathematics Tutor
description: Tutored all levels of mathematics at a 4 your college that offered a mathematics major.

title: Sailing the World
description: Sold the house and the cars and moved aboard a 46â€™ Nordhavn ocean going power vessel.  Cruised up and down the east coast before crossing the Atlantic Ocean as part of the Nordhavn Atlantic Rally in 2004.

title: Computer Programmer/Analyst
description: Various positions in industry as a computer programmer and analyst.  Most of my employers were insurance companies.  I have developed rating systems for property and casualty, claims systems for health, agent compensation systems for life, and patient management systems for long term care.
